divs: sighting detailsat 9:30 the kids started getting texts that the aurora was out- so we went outside to view it. there were 2 bluish\white concentric circles overhead, with bluish\white streamers going off them to the north,east,and west- and blood red patches in the sky to the east, west, and sometimes north. within 10 minutes, the rings started breaking up, and the streamers started blowing apart- but the red in the sky kept changing shape, and moving for about 20 minutes before it started to break up also- within an hour or so, there was nothing left to see. this was not the aurora- i've never seen anything like a blood red sky at night- it was strange.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Petoskey
There were no other sightings in Petoskey on or around October 24th 2011
